As an AI language model, I do not have access to current or up-to-date information on the current condition of the roads in Bougainville. However, based on the historical context of the region, it's likely that the road network is still underdeveloped and, in some areas, may require maintenance and repair.

The Bougainville government and international aid organizations have made efforts to rebuild the region's infrastructure, including its road network. However, limited funding and ongoing challenges have slowed down the pace of reconstruction efforts.

It's important to note that Bougainville is an island region located in the southwestern Pacific Ocean, which makes the transportation of resources for infrastructure development more difficult and expensive. The region has a rugged terrain, which presents additional challenges for road construction.

Overall, progress has been made in rebuilding the road network in Bougainville, but there may still be some areas that require work, maintenance or repairs in order to ensure that the roads are safe, functional and accessible for the population.
